summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons inmate housing history record for Jeffrey Epstein, detailing his cell assignments and movements within the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York from July 6, 2019, to August 10, 2019. The document was generated on June 22, 2021, and shows his final recorded location before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the inmate housing history record, showing his cell assignments and movements within the Metropolitan Correctional Center New York from July 6, 2019, to August 10, 2019.

events.title: Epstein's Initial Housing Assignment
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is recorded as being assigned to House R, Range 01, Bed 001L at the Metropolitan Correctional Center New York.

events.title: Epstein's Final Recorded Location
events.description: The record shows Epstein's final housing assignment as House Z, Range 04, Bed 206L AD, with a stop time of 07:47 on August 10, 2019.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York (MCC NY)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was housed in the Metropolitan Correctional Center New York from at least July 6, 2019, until August 10, 2019.
The document shows multiple cell transfers for Epstein within the facility over a five-week period.
Epstein's final recorded location was House Z, Range 04, Bed 206L AD, with a stop date/time of August 10, 2019, at 07:47.
The document was generated on June 22, 2021, as part of an inmate history query, well after Epstein's death in August 2019.
The record provides a detailed timeline of Epstein's housing assignments during his final incarceration.
